TopicTitle: Forgotten Hope 2: BF2 mod: Patch 2.45 Released Today!!

Articles.Content:
Check out the new awesome trailer of the new patch (2.45) for Forgotten Hope 2 which will be released later on today (Friday 13th July 2012)

Also this video (created by me 8) ) contains a lot of content whis is present in this new patch.

FH2 is a total modification of the game Battlefield 2 by EAgames. If you have Battlefield 2, download the pre-release torrents here: www.fhmod.org. If you don\'t have the game, then make sure that you purchase it just for the sake of playing this fantastic mod! ;D

See you on the battlefield!
